choices: Water from Spring of Drowned Hypnotist.
1.title: What should Ranma find.

choices: "The water is free, however the Hypnotist who drowned was a Woman"
"I have to charge1,000,000 yen for the water because the Hypnotist  was evil"
11.content:
"Stupid Akane" a soaking wet girl form Ranma was muttering to herself "Throwing water on me Just because I told her she was flat. Now I'm going to be late for school and I can't even explain why to the teacher"
Sighing with fustration Ranma ducked into an alleyway and started working on a small fire to heat up her Teakettle she always kept handy for just such an emergency when suddenly she heard a voice from one of the buildings behind her.

"Soaking wet girl dressed in boys clothes franticaly heating up a kettle of water while trying to keep anybody from seeing her. If I diddn't know any better I'd say we've got ourselves a Curse springs victim desperately trying to keep their secret" Said a long bearded old man standing in one of the alleyway doors.

"Hey how'd you know about cursed springs?" asked Ranma turning to talk to the old man.

"Simple young lady, or should I say young man, I am a wizard and this is my shop of magical wonders"

"Magical wonders? Really? Do you have a cursed spring cure?"

"Sadly no, The only cure I had in stock was destroyed last week when a blind duck chasing a pink cat crashed through my store, although I do still have some other curse spring samples avalible if you're unhappy with your current curse."

"Well after what i've seen with Ryoga, Shan-Pu, and Muu-Su, Spring of drowned girl isn't that bad of a curse, but it wouldn't hurt to see what you've got."

Ranma Entered the small alleyay shop and started browsing the selection, ignorig innumerable magical trinkets that he had no idea what they did and went to the shelf filled with small vials of water.

"Spring of drowned tentacle monster, Spring of drowned cow, Spring of drowned dragonfly, Spring of drowned flat chested Sorcoress, ...Spring of drowned sex slave? Spring of drowned Maid? None of these is any good, hey wait what's this Spring of Drowned Hypnotist?"

"Ahhhh water from the cursed spring of the Drowned hypnotist, I hear there was a very tragic story of a Hypnotist who drowned in that spring 38 years ago, and ever since whoever has fallen in to that spring turns into a Hypnotist."

"Somehow I am not surprised, anyway how much for the hypnotist spring water, it acutally sounds like a lot of fun" Ranma asked.

"Before you buy water from spring of drowned hypnotist There is something I should warn you about." Warned the shopkeeper.
11.title: Water from Spring of Drowned Hypnotist.

111.content:
"The water is free, however, the Hypnotist who drowned was a Woman." replied the shopkeeper.

"What? Then I'd still be a girl." replied Ranma.

"Yes, but this hypnotist was said to be the most beautiful in the land. Plus, you will be able to hypnotize anybody you want." replied the owner.

Seeing how the pros out weighed the cons, Ranma payed for the water and headed out. She got onto a roof by herself and opened the bottle. She took a deep breath and splashed the water all over her. She waited for a moment, and soon noticed she had changed. She leapt to a nearby shop window and was stunned at her new appearance.

Her red hair was now a pale lavender that wasn't in a pigtail anymore, but instead fell down her backside. Her outfit also changed to that of a silver bikini that merely covered her nipples and lower region.

'This girl must have been an exhibitionist.' thought Ranma who felt this was much worse than his old female body. Luckily, it seemed the new body also came equipped with a black kimono. Ranma reached in and fished out a gold coin tied to a string.

Seeing the tool needed, she decided to test it out.

12.content:
"Damn it!" yelled Ranma who currently had a lump on his head. He had said Akane's cooking seemed a little strange, and what does she do? She hits him with a freakin mallet! So now here he was, walking to try and clear his head.

While he was walking. he saw something on the ground. He picked it up and saw a statue of a winged female on the front of it while there were strange symbol on the side. Seeing how no one was around, he put it on. riht away, a red mist started seeping out from him as the amulet glowed. The red mist condensed and formed until Ranma was looking at his female form, except she was nude and had a pair of wings on her back, some curved horns on her head, and a arrow tipped tail coming from her butt.

The female Ranma looked him in the eye and latched onto him in a hug. Ranma was stunned, but even more so when his female half got near his face and kissed his cheek. "I am your faithful servant master. I will do all that you command."

Ranma was really stunned, but interested in what she said.

What does he have her do?
12.title: Amulet of Sucubus.

choices: Teach a tomboy to be a wife.(Akane)
Start cooking with the cute girl.(Ukyo)
14.content:
In the Nerima ward, young martal artist Ranma Saotome walks around the city with a aura of anger around him. Ranma had just had a fight with one of his fiances Akane. For a while after the failed wedding Akane seemed nice, but she soon became her old self. Ranma starts calming down, and notices a new store had opened. He walks into the store, and sees someone falling from a high shelf. He runs, and catchs the person before he could fall on a tray of glass bottles. He helps up the person who was a robed old man.
"Thank you for your help young man," the man said.
"It was no problem," Ranma said.
"I must repay you for your help. Find anything you like in my store, and take it," the man said.
"Thanks old guy," Ranma says.
"My name is Garrison Stu, but you can call me Gary," Gary Stu said.
Ranma walked around the store, and found many things, but did not see anything he wanted. Finaly he spots a box with "ONLY A MAN AMONGEST MEN MAY OPEN" writen on it. Remembering the senpaku pact that was made with his mother Ranma decides to take it to see if he could open it, and prove himself to his mother. He shows it to Gary, and is given it.
Ranma is siting alone in a park, and is about to open the box. He opens the box a find a potion in it. The potion says "POTION OF THE LOVER. WARNING WILL INCREASE MANLINESS" and in a very small print(needs magnifying glass to be read)"Manliness is defined as being a pervert, and having many lovers while beliving it to be perfectly all right". Ranma remembers his mother, and decides to drink the potion. He is then knocked out from its effects.
Ranma wakes up with a head ache, and a boner. He trys to remember what happens when he sees Kodachi in the park. He realizes he never noticed how hot she was. He feels the urge to kiss her, and with his new thought trys to do it. He walks behind her, and grabs her, When she turns around he kisses her straght on the lips. She gains a shocked look, but it is soon replaced with love, and devotion. She falls to her knews, and bows her head.
"I love you master," Kodachi says with out her sense of domince.
Ranma is at first confused, but realizes that it was the power of the potion. He wonders if he sould not use it, but the thoughts are soon removed by the potion.Ranma orders Kodachi to take him to her house, and she happly does. When they reach her room Ranma locks the door behind him.
"Strip off your clothes Slave," Ranma orders.
Kodachi joyfuly does wanting to show her Master her body. Ranma quickly grabs her breast, and squizes.
"These belong to me. It is my right as your Master. You have no right to anything. You will spend the rest of your life as a object not a person. You are to be used by my lovers, and myself as a means to releave stress, and not for your own plesure," Ranma says remembering all the problems she caused him as Ranko.
As he forces his slave back on her knees, Ranma wonders what to do next.
14.title: Potion of the Lover.

choices: Show Kodachi getting another girl (rc on who)
Ranma wants to see her little 'kitten'
Ranma goes off for another girl (rc on who)
144.content:
He decided to go out and claim another gal. Why stick with one when he can just gather them all up and fuck them senseless.

"Kodachi, you will assist me in getting more girls. You will go out and stir up trouble with different ones and lead them here." ordered Ranma.

"Yes master." bowed Kodachi who jumped out the window.

"Now, to de claw a cat." grinned Ranma who jumped out a different window and made his way to the cafe where Shampoo and her grandma were at. He walked in and saw Shampoo currently sweeping near the front. He managed to easily sneak up behind her and once she tuned to him, he kissed her. She was stunned, but soon held nothing but love and devotion in her eyes as he pulled back.

"Shampoo, your body and mind belong solely to me. No one else may touch them. You are not a person, but an object to be used by me and my lovers. You may not pleasure yourself and will only feel it from me or one of my lovers." commanded Ranma.

"Yes, I love master only." came Shampoo's response.

Ranma grinned and thought about what to do next.
144.title: Tame a wild pussy cat.(Shampoo)

15.content: Ring of the Mind Thief- When Ranma touchs someone while wearing the ring it starts draining their intelligence into him. Depending on how smart the person is it can take up to a week for the person to reach bimbo levels. Some things can still be retained such as domestic skills like cooking, and cleaning. A side effect of Ranma holding part of the mind of a person, is an inability to not believe what Ranma says as an absolute truth, even if it goes against all they still know or remember.
15.title: Ring of the Mind Thief

152.content: Cursed Amulet of Aphrodite-A magical assassination by Mousse backfires when he places the cursed artifact Amulet of Aphrodite on Ranma. Now not only is his girl half split from him (and constantly throwing herself at him), but now all women who come in contact with him desire him like ants with sugar.
152.title: Other.

153.content:
How about these?

Mind Parasites- The parasites used by Leo Akaba and "The Doctor" in Yu-gi-oh Arc-V to control the "bracelet girls," but mutated, with one being the master. The master gets into Ranma's head, and merges with his brain. Ranma remains himself for the most part, but with the desire to take control of his life, and use the drones to get a slave harem (along with being more open to doing sexual things).

The drones will enter girls' heads, and merge with their brains, but as they are drones, the complete merge will take time. A personality of a devoted love-slave for Ranma with the memories of her original self will be in charge, but her original mind will remain in the back of her head at first, unable to control her body or speak, while slowly becoming assimilated into the new mind until only the drone remains.

The master (Ranma) is able to take over and act through his drones' bodies. All drones can tell when someone else is a drone, or when Ranma's in control of (and thus treat the girl(s) as if they were Ranma, since any orders would come from him).

Wishing Sword- The sword used by Kuno in the manga, which grants three wishes to the owner. Ranma uses the first to remove his cursed form into a separate person unrelated to him, then uses the second to fix his life by changing the Tendo sisters, Shampoo, Ukyo, Kodachi, and Ranko into his openly loving, loyal, obedient harem. The sword only works for wishes from the owner's voice.

Imprinting Eggs- The eggs from the end of the manga. They make the ensnared see the first person they see as their master. They still have their minds and overall personalities, but are unable to even comprehend the thought of disobeying or betraying their master, let alone actually doing it.

Reality Journal- a journal, that when written in, changes reality to reflect what's written. Unless otherwise written, only the writer will remember the change if history is changed. The journal is indestructible.
153.title: Other

info.brief_description: Ranma finds a item with enjoyable effects.
info.description:
After a fight with Akane, Ranma wanders around town and finds a box with a strange object inside. This is the story about what he does with it.
Rules.
No Male on Male.
No Futa.
Here what the objects are.
Water from Spring of Drowned Hypnotist. Gives Ranma the power to hypnotize others.
Amulet of Sucubus. Removes Ranko, and turns her into a Sucubus slave for Ranma with the power to turn other people into a Sucubus.
Ring of Kings. Makes others beleve the wearer is a King, and they are his servents.
Potion of the Lover. Makes whoever Ranma kisses turn into a loveslave.
During the story Ranma can find objects to change peoples forms.
